snippet: While many big banks warehouse derivatives in subsidiaries that rely on federally insured deposits to fund themselves, Morgan Stanley does not — and it could weigh on profits in an already lackluster environment.
abstract: While many big banks warehouse derivatives in subsidiaries that rely on federally insured deposits to fund themselves, Morgan Stanley does not — and it could weigh on profits in an already lackluster environment.

headline.main: Making Sense of Morgan Stanley's Derivatives Moves
